name: 陳家興
objective:
互動智慧空間設計著重虛實整合，再加上智慧代理人觀念，結合使用者經驗，促使程式專業人員與互動設計師合作，來發展使用者與環境隨時互動之智慧介面。本課程結合電子、資工、互動領域，針對無人機、生成式 AI (AIGC)、軟體開發應用、網頁資訊視覺化介面設計、小型企業創新研發等主題，由學習者發想設計，並深入發展程式與開發實務。課程內含空間認知與視覺化、空間資訊與介面設計、機器學習、類神經網路、SCRUM、軟體開發測試、Blender 3D 建模與 AI 生成、Unreal Engine 簡單遊戲設計及無人機群飛。相關程式與應用包括 JavaScript、JSON、Firebase、D3.JS、Apache ECharts、CNN、Python.

The design of interactive smart spaces focuses on integrating reality and reality, coupled with the concept of smart agents and user experience, prompting programming professionals to collaborate with interaction designers to develop smart interfaces that allow users to interact with the environment at any time. This course combines electronics, engineering, and interaction, focusing on topics such as drones, generative AI (AIGC), software development and applications, web information visual interface design, and innovative research and development of small enterprises. Learners and in-depth Development procedures and development practices design it. The course includes spatial cognition and visualization, spatial information and interface design, machine learning, neural networks, SCRUM, software development, and testing, Blender 3D modeling and AI generation, Unreal Engine simple game design and drone swarm flight. Related programs and applications include JavaScript, JSON, Firebase, D3.JS, Apache ECharts, CNN, and Python.

name: 賴冠廷
objective:
空間設計可以將實體空間視為一個人與環境隨時互動之介面，再加上智慧代理人觀念，將促使設計者以新的介面設計觀念探索實體空間之各項設計發展可能性。課程含科技發展與哲學、智慧空間設計方法、智慧空間互動與感知技術、空間資訊控制與介面、空間資訊流與應用。
Physical space could be considered as a real-time interface included of many human-environment interactions when designing space. While the concept of intelligent agent co-jointed with spatial interface, new opportunities opened to designers to explore interactive interface designs and developments of physical space. Course contents included of development and philosophy of science and technology, design method of intelligent space, intelligent interaction and spatial perception technology, spatial information control and interface, and spatial information flow and application.
